name: Drop In Nest
description:
Drop In Nest is an endless fun game that is beautifully crafted for casual gamers who love fast paced, high score games. 

It will definitely test your reflexes as you need to touch and hold to drop the eggs in nest. It’s highly challenging as you need to make sure you drop maximum eggs in nest without failing to let them fall down.

HOW TO PLAY:
• Touch and hold to drop the eggs
• Release to stop dropping egg
